titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for the restraint of excessiue carriages, to the destruction of the high-wayes.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: White Hall, the ninth day of March, in the fift yeere of our reigne ..
Imprint from colophon; the publication year is given according to Lady Day dating.
Arms 24; Steele notation: me- with 2) generall Our.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
